item.description:
Starbucks Tuesdays is still happening this time i would like to experiment how it would be in certain location. First location, Starbucks in the West Farms mall. I think its sort of a central location to meet up at based on the location of where some members are from. 

 

Starbucks is in the Center of the mall. If you don't know its not like a place where you walk in. Its a stand in the middle of the mall with couches and chairs. I'm hoping to get some new members to come hoping the new spot is a convenience because its a shorter travel for people in the hartford and north of hartford area. 

 

See you all at Starbucks Tuesday Night @ 7:30

 

Christian

(860) 357-7264
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the center of the mall where the Starbucks stand is. Contact me (Chris) if you like 860-357-7264
item.name: Starbucks (New Location)
